title: IIEST Shibpur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology Shibpur (IIEST Shibpur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIEST Shibpur Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the last date of application. Here we mentioned more about the age limit, selection proces...
